title: T206 Waddell and Fritz PSA graded for sale
author: Archive

posts.post_title: T206 Waddell and Fritz PSA graded for sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Ricky Y
[IMG]http://i74.photobucket.com/albums/i249/ricardoyo/WadellandFritz.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i74.photobucket.com/albums/i249/ricardoyo/T206back.jpg[/IMG]

A couple of collector grade T206's..well loved but not abused. [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG]

T206 Waddell throwing PSA 1 - creasing in the card (top to bottom) but still a nice image. The back is clean (the one on the Right).  $90.00 Postage Included

T206 Fritz Minor Leaguer PSA 2 - nice image..the back has a smudge on the P in Piedmont (The back of Fritz's card is the one on the Left).  $90.00 Postage Included

Check or MO accepted.

Email if interested at foundnamenotused@yahoo.com

Thanks!

Ricky
